mapper.select: select BoardId, B_Writer, B_Title, B_Date, B_Count from Board

DECLARE @RowsPerPage INT = 10, @PageNumber INT =1 SELECT Rownum, BoardId, B_Writer, B_Title, B_Date, B_Count FROM (select BoardId, B_Writer, B_Title, B_Date, B_Count, row_number() over (ORDER BY BoardId DESC ) as Rownum From Board) as bx Where bx.Rownum BETWEEN ((#{startIndex}-1)* #)+1 And @RowsPerPage*(@PageNumber)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board(B_Writer, B_Password, B_Title, B_Context, B_Count) VALUES (#{B_Writer}, #{B_Password}, #{B_Title}, #{B_Context}, 0)
